name: Comic book library
description: Being a huge fan of the Marvel universe, I made this app to view and search Marvel comics and characters. It’s made with React and is using Marvel’s API to pull data.

name: Movie library
description: This app was made for an Angular presentation, it covers many Angular notions like routes, auth and form validation. It uses IMDb API to get the information about movies and a Firebase database.

name: E-commerce store
description: I made this website from design to implementation for a local child clothing line. It helps customers view products and place their orders. It uses Gatsby for the frontend and Node.js for the backend.

name: Portal website
description: I worked on this website as a consultant for a multinational company. The website presents the company's services and products. It uses Drupal as a content management system.
